profile_positions.title: Freelance (evaluation and communication) consultant

profile_positions.description: Management of environmental and health projects (mostly related to Persistent Organic Pollutants, obsolete pesticides and mercury) in South and Eastern Europe, the Caucasus and Central Asia and support to projects in West Africa (ECOWAS countries). Most projects were funded by UN Environment, the EU and FAO (Food and Agriculture Organization of the UN). Similar projects, tasks and responsibilities as at Milieukontakt International, see below.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
Senior project manager
Intermediary
Project manager
